content.question: Of the following, which is not a solution to the differential equation <math alttext="y double prime, minus 9 y, equals 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>″</mo></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>9</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="y equals, the sine of, open parenthesis, 3, t, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>t</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="y equals, e raised to the 3, t power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>t</mi></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="y equals, 4 times e raised to the negative 3, t power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>t</mi></mrow></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="y equals, the sine of, open parenthesis, 3, t, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>t</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: Skill 3.G: Confirm that solutions are accurate and appropriate.
